org.xchain.framework.jxpath.Scope

  • Packages that use Scope 
    Package Description
    org.xchain.framework.jxpath
    Provides bindings to the JXPath project.
    org.xchain.framework.lifecycle
    Provides classes that execute the XChain lifecycle.
    org.xchain.namespaces.core
    The base core commands for xchains.
    org.xchain.namespaces.hibernate
    This namespace provides access to hibernate.
